product.name: Water Bottle Holder with Strap, 4 Big Pockets with Compartment, 24oz/32oz/40oz Crossbody Water Bottle Carrier Bag
product.bullet_points:
• DURABLE&WATERPROOF-Tired of water bottle sleeves wearing out easily? Our water bottle carrier with strap is made of waterproof-grade polyester fiber, ensuring no trace of liquid is left behind. Furthermore, the metal hooks and zipper components far exceed those of other brands' plastic accessories, offering higher durability and resistance to wear and tear, providing comprehensive protection for your water bottle.
• INSULATED LINGING-The dimensions of the water bottle sling bag are 4" x 5" x 12", making it suitable for bottles ranging from 32 ounces to 40 ounces. The interior is lined with aluminum foil for efficient insulation, enabling long-lasting heat retention for hot drinks and keeping cold beverages chilled. Now you can enjoy ice-cold refreshments anywhere, anytime during scorching summers or savor a cup of hot coffee while camping in winter.
• KEEP EVERYTHING ORGANIZED-The water bottle holder has a total of 4 pockets, including 2 front zippered pockets with 1 card pocket, 2 mesh pockets, and 1 dedicated pocket for phones (fits phones up to 7.1 inches). The 2 side pockets can hold snacks and lip balm. With its diverse and neatly arranged storage space, it is convenient to store and access items such as water bottles, smartphones, purse, cards, and keys etc. Simply wear it and enjoy lightweight travel!
• MUTIPLE CARRING OPTIONS-Equipped with two detachable shoulder straps, a 13-inch short strap for hand-carrying, and an adjustable 30-58 inch long strap for cross-body or single-shoulder carrying. It can meet the needs of different ages and body shapes, the fashionable color matching brings infinite possibilities to your outfit. The shoulder pad is filled with 5mm padding, ensuring that you won't feel any pressure or discomfort on your shoulders during long-distance wear.
• MULTI-SITUATION APPLICATION-It features a key hook and an eyeglass hook, making it the perfect choice for hiking, camping, gym workouts, work, as well as travel, school, walks, or sporting events. It is also the ideal gift for family, friends, and loved ones on holidays and birthdays. Ideal for those who need to stay hydrated on the go but dislike carrying bulky water bottles, allows you to free up your hands while ensuring proper hydration. Embrace DIKUER’s water bottle bag just right now!
